summary: This is an email chain regarding a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) lawsuit, The New York Times v. Bureau of Prisons (BOP), concerning the release of records related to Jeffrey Epstein. The email discusses the filing of a reply or opposition brief in the case.

events.title: FOIA Lawsuit Filed
events.description: The New York Times files a Freedom of Information Act lawsuit against the Bureau of Prisons seeking records related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email regarding a FOIA lawsuit, The New York Times v. Bureau of Prisons, case number 20-cv-833.
The lawsuit seeks records related to Jeffrey Epstein from the Bureau of Prisons.
The email discusses the filing of a reply or opposition brief in the ongoing case.
